settings.family_intro_text: Revivex Wash-In Water Repellent maximizes breathability and keeps you dry all-season long. Nothing should stop you from shedding the rain or shredding the slopes. Use Revivex Wash-In to waterproof all your beloved outerwear and gear.
settings.family_tip_text: Do not machine wash tents. The agitator can cause damage to the fabric, coatings and seam tape. Clean tents when they are pitched and taut using Revivex Pro Cleaner and rinse off with water.
